q: Can I use this card for shopping ?
a: Yes, you can use this card in Conbini or Supermarket.

q: How much can I charge for one time ?
a: You can charge from 1000 to 1000 , but not over 10000 yen !
There are two ways you can charge which are Cash or Credit Card.

q: Where can I use this card ?
a: You can use in transportation fee and shopping in supermarket
